title: Runner
weapons: Dagger, longbow, longsword, shortbow, shortsword, spear
fluff: Half-elves are the rare offspring of elves and humans. They tend to combine the best features of their parents, but usually considered outcasts in both human and elven societies.

specialTalents.name: Farsight.
specialTalents.description: You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons.

specialTalents.name: Wayfinder.
specialTalents.description: You have advantage on navigation checks and checks assosiated with traking, survivalism, or nature.

specialTalents.name: Stealthy.
specialTalents.description: You have advantage on checks to sneak and hide.

specialTalents.name: Herbalism.
specialTalents.description:
Make an Intelligence check to find one of the following edible herbs (Wayfinder talent applies to this check). If you fail, you can't use this talent again until you complete a rest. Herbs retain their effect for 1 day.
  • DC 9 Mushroom. 3:6 chance of healing 1 HP
  • DC 12 ???. Stops the effect of a poison
  • DC 15 Rushwort. ADV on WIS to notice things for 10 rounds
  • DC 18 Foebane. Grants ADV on attacks and damage against one creature type for 1d4 rounds
  • DC 20 ???. Big heal

talents.talent: You deal d12 damage with one weapon type you choose
+1 to attacks and damage on melee or ranged
+2 to Strength, Dexterity, or Intelligence score
Reduce the difficulty of your herbalism checks by one step
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

reward.name: Lodge.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Ranger a half-elf may establish or build a Lodge. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.
